question: Many a times we read about “Circuit Breakers” in share markets. They are temporary measures which halt the trading on which of the following occasion?
option2: When a new share is traded for the first time
option3: When the prices of particular stock’s) rises or falls by a specified amount in specified time
option4: When trading of a particular stock(s) has rises beyond a specified volume
answer: When the prices of particular stock’s) rises or falls by a specified amount in specified time
